event.title: founded in this formerly remote and desolate area of the Sierra Morena in 1767

data.event: La Carolina was formerly the capital of the Intendencia of the Nuevas Poblaciones de Andaluc√≠a y Sierra Morena founded in this formerly remote and desolate area of the Sierra Morena in 1767 by King Carlos III.
The Intendencia administrative division was wrapped up in 1813.

event.title: a few years, about half of them had died

data.event: With a few years, about half of them had died from illness or gone home: the rest gradually lost their national identities over the years, and took on the language and customs of their host country.
